languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}, смиренно прошу минуту вашего внимания! Я — Бастьян ин Дерама Бастаал-Чорда, младший кузен династии Чорда, представитель Инцендии Бастаал-Чорда, милостью святейшего {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} Простора Коронус".

"{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}, смиренно прошу минуту вашего внимания! Я — Бастьян ин Дерама Бастаал-Чорда, младший кузен династии Чорда, представитель Инцендии Бастаал-Чорда, милостью святейшего {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} Простора Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of the Chorda dynasty, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of the Chorda dynasty, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}、恐れ多くも貴重なお時間をいただきたく存じます！私はチョーダ一族の末席、インセンディア・バスタール・チョーダの使者、神聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の恩寵を受けてコロヌス・エクスパンスの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に任命されましたデラマ＝バスタール・チョーダのバスティアンと申します」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}、恐れ多くも貴重なお時間をいただきたく存じます！私はチョーダ一族の末席、インセンディア・バスタール・チョーダの使者、神聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の恩寵を受けてコロヌス・エクスパンスの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に任命されましたデラマ＝バスタール・チョーダのバスティアンと申します」

languages.text: “{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}大人{/d}，我恳请您为我抽出一分钟时间！我是德拉玛的巴斯蒂安·巴斯塔·库尔达，库尔达家族的表亲。我的主人是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}在科罗努斯扩区任命的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，因森蒂娅·巴斯塔·库尔达，而我是她的特使。”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我恳请您为我抽出一分钟时间！我是德拉玛的巴斯蒂安·巴斯塔·库尔达，库尔达家族的表亲。我的主人是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}在扩区任命的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，因森蒂娅·巴斯塔·库尔达，而我是她的特使。”

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|Milord|Milady}{/d}, ¡le ruego que me dedique un minuto! Me llamo Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, el primo más joven de la casa Chorda y legado de Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la Extensión de Koronus por gracia del santísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, ¡le ruego que me dedique un minuto! Me llamo Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, el primo más joven de la casa Chorda y legado de Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la Extensión de Koronus por gracia del santísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».

languages.text: « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Votre Seigneurie{/d}, auriez-vous l'amabilité de m'accorder une minute de votre temps ? Je suis Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, benjamin des cousins de la maison Chorda, émissaire d'Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} des Étendues de Koronus par la grâce du très saint {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, auriez-vous l'amabilité de m'accorder une minute de votre temps ? Je suis Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, benjamin des cousins de la maison Chorda, émissaire d'Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} des Étendues de Koronus par la grâce du très saint {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}{/d}, darf ich in aller Demut um eine Minute Eurer Zeit ersuchen? Ich bin Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, jüngster Vetter des Hauses Chorda, Gesandter von Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} der Koronus-Ausdehnung durch die Gnade des heiligsten {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, darf ich in aller Demut um eine Minute Eurer Zeit ersuchen? Ich bin Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, jüngster Vetter des Hauses Chorda, Gesandter von Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} der Koronus-Ausdehnung durch die Gnade des heiligsten {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri{/d}, cüretimi mazur görün ama bir dakikanızı rica edebilir miyim? Bendeniz Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda. Chorda Hanesi'nin en genç ferdi ve kutsal efendimiz {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri'nin lütfuyla Koronus Enginliği'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'i{/g} mertebesine erişen İncendia Bastaal-Chorda'nın elçisiyim."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}, I humbly ask for a minute of your time! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, cüretimi mazur görün ancak bir dakikanızı rica edebilir miyim? Bendeniz Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, Chorda Hanesi'nin en genç kuzeni ve kutsal efendimiz, yüce {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un lütfuyla Koronus Enginliği'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'i olan İncendia Bastaal-Chorda'nın elçisiyim."
